title: Login Issues on New Client
body: Hey so on the new client I get an "Unable to connect to login queue" error, but when I try the legacy client it logs me in but wont connect me to the chat. The chat always says "logging on" but never actually does it. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
Hey so I got these issues when I took the test for packet loss, what exactly do they mean? And how do I fix them?

Minor Aberrations â€“
Certain TCP protocols are blocked in outbound traffic 
We detected at least one proxy 
We detected an HTTP proxy due to flow content changes 
The path between our system and your network does not appear to handle fragmented IPv6 traffic properly

It seems like something could be blocking your network from reaching the authentication server, so it won't even get a chance to check your login info.  My suggestion would be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot for a fix.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
